message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $11,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is quite limited. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below the value of this product. I'm willing to come down a bit further, how about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I still believe that $10,000 is a fair price for the product. Would you be able to meet me halfway?
Bob, you're right, meeting halfway seems fair.  How about $10,750, and we close the deal?
